#labels Phase-Requirements
How to build TwitLib...

= Introduction =

* In order to build TwitLib you must follow these instructions...

1. Checkout the repository. 
i.e. - svn co http://twitlib.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/

2. Qt4 must be installed (currently 4.4.0)

3. Linux must be used (currently Ubuntu 8.04)

4. From the root directory type command 'qmake'

5. From the root directory type command 'make'

6. The lib will be produced into "rootdir"/release
